input2: A female patient presents with fatigue, muscle cramping, and abnormal lab results. She has experienced generalized weakness and muscle cramping for several days. Recently, she had a urinary tract infection (UTI) and was treated in the emergency department with a one-week course of cefpodoxime, completed yesterday. The urine culture indicated pan-sensitive E. coli.
